name: Real Printer 1
description: A basic cheap printer that is easy to use and has a large community of users.

name: Benchy
description: A basic test print that is used to test the quality of a printer.

name: Real Hydroponics Kit 1
description: A hydroponics tub with all the basic features you need to grow your own plants.

name: White PLA filament
description: 1 gram of white PLA filament for an FDM printer.

name: Edison Model M
description: A futuristic electric vehicle with Fully Supervised Driving (FSD) capabilities.

name: Portable solar panel
description: A portable solar panel that can be used to charge your devices. Supports USB-A and USB-C ports, and it has a 110V AC outlet, with support for 200W at peak sunpower.

name: 1 kWh battery pack
description: A 1 kWh battery pack that can be used to store energy from a solar panel or a wind turbine.

name: 500W wind turbine
description: A 500W wind turbine that can be used to generate electricity.

name: Benchy award
description: A trophy granted for printing your first Benchy.

name: Real Hydroponics Tub 1
description: A hydroponics tub with all the basic features you need to grow your own plants.
